titleStmt.title: Dakrua basilika. That is, the princly teares of Elisabetha, Queen of Bohemia: ouer the death, of her eldest sonne, Fridericus Henricus: Count Palatijn: Duke of Bavaria. / Written by Daniel Souterius: minister of the word of God, at Haerlem.
titleStmt.author: Souterius, Daniel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Harman Cranepoel, in the green cross.,

notesStmt.note: Each language version (English, French, Dutch, Latin) has special t.p. and separate register.
